definition: mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
measure of length, ten Chinese feet (3.3 m)/to measure/husband/polite appellation for an older male

sentences.english: Unfortunately Uncle and Aunty were going to a concert later in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 可惜姨丈和阿姨当天晚上还要去听别人的音乐会。

sentences.english: Uncle Vernon didn't go to work that day.
sentences.chinese: 维能姨丈那天没有去上班。

sentences.english: Their present to Justin himself is a transformer-motorcycle.
sentences.chinese: 姨丈和阿姨送了变形金刚摩托车给大贝贝。

sentences.english: Uncle Meng Feng and Aunty MJ gave little Audrey a toy puppy.
sentences.chinese: 孟风姨丈和MJ阿姨送给小贝贝的玩具狗。

sentences.english: Uncle Vernon was pointing at what looked like a large rock way out at sea.
sentences.chinese: 维能姨丈所指的地方看上去像一片通向大海的岩石群。

definition: mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
husband of younger female cousin via female line
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
older male cousin via female line
wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
wife of older male cousin via female line
